reviews.review_text: Came here especially today to use my Patty Pass and tried the Veggie Deluxe Burger with cheese. It was sooo good. The sauce was the best part. I also have to comment on the prices. Its so affordable. Half the price of most places nowadays. A can of beer is 3.75! My burger (no sides) was 6.75. Unheard of these days! The service was fast and friendly. When I walked in I was the only customer but shortly after it filled up. Ill definitely be back when Im in the area!

This was a neat hole in the wall burger joint. They had some younger kids running the place and they were very professional and delivered a good product. Fantastic to see. The actual taste was reminiscent of a good bbq cookout burger. We had milkshakes and thoroughly enjoyed those too!
Great portion of fries and a great older atmosphere! The burgers are also tasty.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Martin.

reviews.review_text: They have a vastly large menu to choose from that is prominently posted on the wall as you come in. Everything is fairly well priced, if not cheaper, for the quality of the food. The front staff are friendly and welcoming. The store space is quite small, so its more so a place to get something to go rather than eat in, but they do have some tables and stools as well. Plenty of free parking as they are located within a shopping plaza. The wally burger I got was delicious and I would recommend.

The staff were kind and friendly. Burger was fantastic . I tried the ring tangler and thoroughly enjoyed it. The fry portion was generous , and salty ! Overall a nice place to stop for lunch if you have a few more minutes than fast food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thanks Ev we appreciate your kindness

reviews.review_text: Awesome little burger joint! We love this place! Located in a small strip mall so decent parking.  Accessible, not many tables though. A big menu! Very tasty, fresh food every single time! The staff are consistently friendly, helpful and down to Earth. We look forward to visiting again and again! Parking: Small but free parking lot Kid-friendliness: Perfect place for kids! Wheelchair accessibility: Accessible parking, entrance and seating.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Shannon that is very nice of you to say. We are fortunate to have such great friendly staff and great customers like you.

reviews.review_text: August 14 2021 My friend brought me here during work and ai was immediately amazed and addicted. Came back today to satisfy a long waited craving of the absolute best burgers in town. They taste homemade and created with love and affection. I hear they have been around for a quarter century and I do not see them going anywhere soon, only expanding to distant lands. Thank you for making our day and tickling my taste buds while drooling during each bite. This is what a burger tastes like. If you live far away from one of their locations, make the trip down and you will not be disappointed. Ive read some of the negative reviews and they are bullshivic. The food experience speaks for itself. Even if they screwed up my order or the girl today was mean to me I would still come back for the food. Im not sure whats in their food but its messing with my dopamine uptake. It must the the love. Ps. Not sure what happened to my original post but hopefully this one is similar. Great job team. Youll be seeing more of me until I try everything. And yes, I have thanked my colleague, he is one special guy. Cheers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow thanks so much for your kind words and thank your friend for introducing you to us. We can accommodate you by serving your burger on a bed of lettuce next time if that s what you want.

reviews.review_text: Last time I went into a Wallys was when I was a wee lad back in a time where ipods used cassettes and Wallys was across Norquay Park. Ive decided to pick up lunch here after my usual go to was closed, and Im glad I made that decision. I was greeted by a kind Cashier in a storefront filled with grumbling impatient patrons waiting for their orders, her unwavering cheerful attitude was definitely the highlight of the whole experience and the wait wasnt terribly long (15 minutes). The place is usually packed during lunch time and while there is a big parking lot in the complex it gets quite busy making it difficult to navigate in and out. Their burgers were much more better than I had last remembered, not greasy and it had the home style charred flavour. Their Milkshake is still as top notch as ever. They are very generous with the fries, the amount that comes in one combo was enough for two people, the fries were very crunchy and not greasy at all. Definitely one of the better burger joints out there and definitely a must try milkshake place Ive always walked past this storefront but now I will definitely come back to fulfill my burger cravings
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mark. Hope you become a regular with us

reviews.review_text: The old school burger joint reminiscent of when I was a kid. Special kinds of burger buns here, which are a USP since the store opened in 1958. I had the beer fries and burger combo. Tasted like good childhood memories. Parking: Parking in the 88 supermarket lot is easy.
You have to try the deep fried pickles with the Wally sauce!! ... thats all Ive had from here but they were amazing
Burgers like they were meant to be. Deluxe Chuckwagon is unreal. Onion rings like you remember. If you want that old school burger experience this is your place.
I used to always love coming to this place growing up. My uncle who has now passed used to love this place and its been in our family for some time as well. Cant wait to visit again!

This place is the epitome of a greasy spoon/hole in the wall. If you dont know then you might not even see it as you drive by, but if you do know... Oh boy. Youre in for a treat! I love a good burger. Not a fancy burger with all the fixings hiding a bad burger underneath. This place will make you a good burger, AND theyll put exactly the fixings you want on it. The fries are so good too. I think theyre shoestring style? My friends also raved about the milkshakes, of which they have a truly amazing number of flavours. Would recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Noal were blushing from your kind words. We appreciate when customers rave about our burgers, thanks. Our fries are made in house from fresh hand cut kennebec potatoes and wed say they are between a shoestring and a thick cut and were so happy you think theyre so good. Thanks for the recommendation and we hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: These are the burgers of my childhood. My parents used to take me to the one on Kingsway when I was a kid and even though I dont remember what the burgers tasted like, I knew I loved them. When I found out that there was still a restaurant in Vancouver, I had to go. Unfortunately, during Covid, the seating wasnt available which meant I needed to takeout. I dont live nearby and it was too hot to sit outside or in my car, so I had to take it home. But even at room temperature, everything was delicious. Fresh and flavourful. I cant wait to go again!

I wanted to try out the new Wally since I was a fan of the old Wally on Kingsway. Ill give the burger a 5 star, but 4 overall. The burger was packed with flavor and reminds me of the old Wally. The fries are not the old McCain fries which I personally like, but I dont blame them for switching to hand cut fries as majority of people like those better. The only drawback is the location. Tight and crowded parking welcomes you. The restaurant is tiny, but cute. I really just came to try the burger and it is didnt disappointed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thanks we appreciate your business

reviews.review_text: Little hole in the wall burger joint that serves up  greasy, messy, old school burgers. Great variety of burgers, all day breakfast and hot dogs. Fries are awesome. Milkshakes are delicious. Really friendly good service. Highly recommend.
great burgers. may not be fast but good food takes time.
Great burgers, reasonably priced Amazing milkshakes and Service Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mike.

reviews.review_text: Classic Vancouver burger joint. Love the greasy spoon look and taste. When one feels in the mood for that this is the place to be.

This place makes great burgers and shakes. The menu is pretty large considering that the physical space isnt huge. They also tend to hire people who havent had a lot of work experience, which is great for the community, so have patience and know that you might have to double-check your order, but its worth it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks David we appreciate your kind words.

reviews.review_text: Unreal milkshakes and best burger joint in Vancouver! Not to mention how many fries you get every time with your order!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ryan we appreciate your support. Our fry serving is approximately 1/2 lb so theres always lots to share.

reviews.review_text: The food is excellent. Burgers are classic, and the milkshakes are so good. The only thing is this place is closed more often than any other restaurant I think I ve seen. What restaurant closes on a Sunday lol? At least they extended their weekday hours from 5pm to 7pm. I will continue to support this place because I ve never had a bad experience with the burgers. They really do an excellent job. And the price is right too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Justin thanks for the feedback we appreciate it. Us, like many restaurants are being effected by a lack of available qualified labour at this current time which limits our ability to operate at full capacity. We hope this will change in the near future but until then we will maintain our current hours of operation.

reviews.review_text: Listen, Im not going to sit here and bs and tell you these are the best artisanal burgers in town. But if you spent your youth in hockey rinks and side shack stopovers on the way home from a baseball game, these burgers will taste like love to you.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rory we appreciate your kindness.

reviews.review_text: Great food and shakes when i was 10, still amazing food at 30!
So far, the best burger in town. Real meat! Real fries    ! Wagon bun  %. Worth every single penny!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you

reviews.review_text: A little piece of a Diner. Great burgers, plus they have beer  .

This is the place for my weekly fix for a real burger.  It is very reasonable priced yet the food is 100 times better than your McD, if you consider McD burger is a burger.  Also the cashiers are always fast and friendly and well-trained Vegetarian options: Try the mushroom burger, you will be in for a tasty surprise Parking: It is next to the plaza of 88 supermarket, so most of the time, you would find a space within 1 min
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Karen we appreciate your support and kind words

reviews.review_text: Good price, good service, good food . Came in 20 minutes to closing and ordered the Deluxe Bacon Cheese meal and a strawberry shake. As expected the burger was fantastic. The fries were also great, however I do wish they were a little longer as it seemed like I got a bunch of half fries. The shake was also delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks we re glad you enjoyed. We hand cut the fries everyday and unfortunately sometimes the potatoes are smaller than we d like too.

reviews.review_text: I take my son here for milk shakes n fries Their deep fried pickles are top notch. Great prices! Recommended dishes Hot Shot Burger with Cheese Bacon and Jalapenos, Fries, Burger

First time here, had a craving for a burger and came here to satisfy it. This is a classic style small town feel burger joint, milkshakes and all. If textures are your thing, than you came to the right place, I have no idea how they cook the fries, but they nailed it, soft on the inside, crunchy on the outside, the bun on the burger is soft and has an almost creamy feel in your mouth. Flavours were on point as well, I will be back for more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michael glad you enjoyed

reviews.review_text: This place is absolutely wonderful. The staff is always so friendly and accommodating. The food is just plain delightful! Best burger joint around hands down! The inside is not the prettiest to look at and the parking lot can sometimes be a nightmare, but the food makes it all so very worth it. Seriously, if you have ever thought of trying this place but havent gone in yet, DO IT, you will not regret it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the kind words.

reviews.review_text: One of the best burgers in the city. Great selection, really tasty, lots of options to choose from. The milkshakes were great too! Definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Dear, we appreciate your kind words

reviews.review_text: Delicious burgers that are juicy and old school. It can get messy, but its worth every bite and every calorie. Wish I discovered this place sooner. They have a multitude of milkshake flavours. Peach is my favourite though. Will definitely go to Wallys whenever Im craving a burger.

No other burger shop in the lower mainland serves better burgers than Wallys Burgers, which serves authentic homemade burgers at a decent price. Favorites include the Wally loaded & the Wally works with chipotle mayo for the fries. Note. There is nothing better than a good burger in its messy form. Wallys burgers are straight-up delicious

Today was first time we orderd here. Our food was $40 worth and it was hot flaming well seasoned and juicy served with crusty buns. Also ordered the English Toffee milkshake and it was creamy and the tempreture is perfectly chilled. It was definitely worth $40. Annie the cashier was very knowledgeable of  all the burgers and Sue the manager is very aproachable and friendly. This place definitely has a good vibe and respectful crew! Props!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Charlie we appreciate it

reviews.review_text: SEPT 2019 Still a great burger but starting to get pricy. MARCH 2019   go to Wally Burgers on a regular basis.  Went again today.  One of the best.  Burger was juicy and done to perfection.  Fries were crispy and tasty. Staff went overboard to correct a slight error in order.  Very customer oriented and the pricing is reasonable for the quality of the product.  Definately recommend a visit if you love burgers. 2018, Still a bit of the 50s atmosphere.  Tried the deluxe Wally burger special deal at two for $5.00.  As I love my burgers, nothing outstanding have had better.  Fries were well done crispy, not greasy.  Onion rings were done the way I like them as they too were crispy.  For the price its a good deal but not as outstanding as when they were on Kingsway.

I d like to think I m a cheeseburger connoisseur and I ve been all over Vancouver... this is by far the best I ve had. Just a simple burger made to perfection. House sauce is fantastic and the classic buns are perfect. The fries were on point! Hand spun Root beer milkshake is a classic to wash it down!

I do not know what words I have for this restaurant. This restaurants food is beyond excelling, their service is amazing. I fail to see any imperfections in this restaurant. Their burgers are juicy, fries are perfectly cooked, and prices are reasonable. I feel that this restaurant would be the best burger joint in Vancouver. Its placement is not that great, as its in a far corner of a strip mall, but dont give up on finding it. Itll be worth the search. Their shakes are good, but may not be the best in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words.

reviews.review_text: I like it, I like it, I like it! If its retro smash burgers from the drive-in era that you enjoy, this is the place. Although it isn t a drive-in, the nostalgic feel and look of this place will be enough. Hidden amongst the stores of the strip mall plaza, here you will find savoury burgers from the time when they were simple and made with a  secret sauce . We ordered two    Hotshots  (basically a bacon burger with jalapeno peppers). The burger was juicy with a great char from the flat top grill. I could have had two, or combo ed it to fill up, but it was a great morsul that we will order, eat, enjoy and repeat in the near future; maybe next time with a good looking milkshake
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Todd. We really appreciate your support and kind words. We hope to see you again really soon.

reviews.review_text: The quintessential burger, done right in every way. Patty is juicy and full of flavor. Its the first burger my wife has ever said shes loved! Ive been looking for this burger for 2 years ever since I moved to Vancouver and finally found it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Derryck we appreciate it

reviews.review_text: Fries are nice and salty, bother is perfectly seasoned and perfectly messy, as it should be! The portions are VERY reasonable and I like that they offer chicken burgers too. Salted caramel milkshake is off-the-walls delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thanks Charles we appreciate your feedback

reviews.review_text: Read the reviews and was skeptical but finally got around to trying them. Best burgers Ive had in the lower mainland hands down. Bit messy to eat, but what good burger isnt?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Yi glad you enjoyed it. We recommend lots of napkins at the ready.

reviews.review_text: Amazing burgers! Poutine was fantastic. Staff is all super friendly and everything came fast and very fresh. Also super clean in there. Love this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Kaity we appreciate your kind words and support

reviews.review_text: Double chuckwagon with cheese  and an orange milkshake. Best lunch ever. A hidden gem in Vancouver, the girl behind the counter is super nice. Keep the napkins handy its one juicy burger  .

Oh man what a good Halibut Burger!!! Wallys has amazing burgers, and their fries arent too bad either. Tried the new to the menu Halibut Burger. It was really good. Not greasy, but a thin and crunchy batter.  My partner had the Chuck wagon burger that was huge, and we did share fries, because the portions are pretty substantial. Our meals arrived quickly, and everything was piping hot. The parking structure is large, but so busy. There was alot of Handicap parking available,  thoughout the lot. Im picky however about parking my car in the lot, as i do have a preference to dent free doors. Wallys is definitely Handicap accessible,  and they have table able to accommodate wheelchairs if needed. The staff were all very nice & presented themselves well. All were willing to engage in conversation with us, and when we left the restaurant we were bid farewell, and thanked for our business.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you. We appreciate your kind words

reviews.review_text: Love this restaurant! The food is amazing and there are a lot of choices. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful.

Awesome to find this gem. I had thought this place was permanently erased from my childhood when I had learned that the restaurant on kingsway was shutting its doors forever. I ordered 2 wally burgers and a chocolate milkshake and it had brought back memories of sitting outside of the original restaurant on a summers day on kingsway. I have to admit it was very close to what I had over 10 years ago. The bun was toasted nicely and had a generous amount of sauce. The onions felt like it hasnt changed at all. It still had that strong onion flavor with every bite I took. The seasoning felt pretty close to what I remembered. As for the milkshake, maybe the  old Asian woman that prepared it back then gave me an extra shot of chocolate or icecream, but the shake that was served was perfect enough. The staff are super friendly and the prices are reasonable. This location is located in a strip mall so parking is available and free. I knew that the food couldnt be duplicated from my childhood years but this came damn close and Im so glad to see its doors open again.

Very nostalgic for me. I love Wallys Chuck wagon deluxe burger with a banana milkshake! Brings back many memories of eating here as a child (back in the day when it was on Kingsway). I highly recommend stopping by for a taste of Vancouver history! This location is new, but the menu goes back to my parents time. And the food is fantastic! You wont find a better burger around. I wish they had more locations

The Halibut Burger is so so so so good, everything you hoped for in a Filet-o-Fish. The poutine is a must, and for smaller appetites a regular Wally burger will suffice. I think this might be home to the original smash burger, every patty is grilled to crispy perfection with quality tasting beef.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, we appreciate your support and kind words

reviews.review_text: Eating the fries and burgers was like tasting heaven

This is our review based on our visit Thursday, July 16, 2020 (order in person and take out). First, a shoutout to front staff and all the frontline workers braving their souls to deal with the public mass and risking their lives during this pandemic. As we continue on with the new normal and unfortunate spike during last week, it is expected that we all want transparency.  Do staff wear masks?  On my day of my order, no.  I was shocked the 2 staff members that I saw  at the back do not wear masks at all.  I understand that people now want to know if staff members are wearing masks or not (especially cooks) so here is your answer.  It doesnt affect my rating though.  But I sincerely would have hoped the cook staff would wear one though.  Also, I hope they would add on another plexiglass  for the front counter so the cashier wont have to be that exposed to outsiders for health and safety reasons. It only has half a side so when she takes your orders, she will still have be on the side with no plexiglass and I felt bad for her.  Again, it all comes back to safety at this day and time and when staff are safe and healthy, we are healthy (and vice versa).  Hopefully, they would move on to online ordering so we can order, pay online and pick up.  Otherwise, you will have to order in-person and take out.  The wait for your food isnt long either even when I was a part of a wait (customers ahead of me) so its just as fast as McDonalds.  As customers, I also notice other customers are socially distancing too (of course, you would get an  odd ball that seem to not know what is going on in the world and would try to be very close to you, SMH).   Otherwise, burgers are flavourful (not to a point where its so salty that you cant even eat it).  Onion rings are to die so you may want to order more.

Best burger shack ever the staff always have a huge smile when working and go above and beyond in general customer satisfaction. What I like most is that they put in the effort to get to know you like your a distant relative they haven t seen for years kinda level.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks T for the kind words. We thank you for choosing us and we always want all customers to feel welcome and appreciated. Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Amazing service, everyone is so sweet every time I come. Plus, the burgers are fantastic. Cheap pricing for fresh local ingredients. Don t even get me started on the sauce

Very reasonably priced burgers and fries. All the sauces and veggies all balances well with the size of the juicy patty. Id come visit again if I am in the area. Maybe next time I should try their milkshake?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kelly thanks for the kind words hope you have a happy 2019

reviews.review_text: A great place for your typical burger diner experience. The patties are the thinner, diner type, unlike the large patties found at Romers (which are for plated experience). We also enjoy having a bubblegum milkshake with our meal.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks. We appreciate your business

reviews.review_text: Used to eat at Walleys when on Kingsway in the 80,s  Still the best buns in town. It had been years since I had Walleys.  Same great burgers,   big food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Tony thanks for the kind words. We appreciate it

reviews.review_text: Great delicious well made burgers. The fries too were crunchy and perfectly fried. I highly recommend this hidden old gem.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words Andrea it means a lot to us. We appreciate your support

reviews.review_text: Delicious , realistically matched with the high review score. If wasn t for the crazy coupon price, McDonald s never stood a chance against Wally. + great stuff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Braden

reviews.review_text: Friendly and smiling staff, great burger for the price, and the French fries were PERFECT. Crispy outside, soft yielding inside, and not overcooked. No wonder theyve been around so long! Oh, and they have BEER now   Its just Bud or Canadian, but its a start.

Underrated! Fries are crispy and fresh like New York Fries. Burgers are spot on. Used to go to the Wallys on Kingsway and happy to see them carry on the name here. Keep up the good work! Best burger joint in Fraserview area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you, we appreciate your kind words

reviews.review_text: Good diner-style burgers and poutine. The fries are delicious. Comfort food done right. I just wish they were open on Sundays and later in the evenings for dinner.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Look for us to open on Sundays starting in the fall. depending on how the pandemic plays out well be adjusting our hours

reviews.review_text: Yummy!  Had a classic loaded burger with fries.  Hit the spot.  Recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks C we appreciate your support and kind words.

reviews.review_text: Great value and fresh food with friendly staff and a clean restaurant. Sensible portion size and the fries were excellent, as mentioned in other reviews. Will definitely be back!
Tasty but the sausages are a bit salty for us.   Definitely way better than MacDonald s.  I recommend this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sharon we appreciate your support

reviews.review_text: 5star service on every aspect. Reminds me of when they use to be on Kingsway. Same great food just a new location. Keep up the great work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you so much Pal Gadey we really appreciate you kind words and support.

reviews.review_text: Seems a very popular place. Have not tried it yet. They accept coupons from McDonalds and others. Take out only. Parking is tight in this strip mall parking lot.
Good burgers and excellent fries. Try Wallys location at Cates Park in the summer for a special treat.. Glad to see them reopen for dining in.
The iconic Wallys Burgers is still making their legendary burgers! Great food and great service! A real blast from the past
Absolutely amazing each time! Got a regular cheese poutine and it was so cheesy, crispy, and so much gravy was delish! Could barely finish the bowl!
Like a mutant triple-O s but with everything better. This place is out of the way and not your usual joint. The burgers are absolutely killer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Love the mutant triple 0 reference thanks for the kind words

reviews.review_text: Love this place first time I ate there was about 25 years ago lol was in a different location but still great burgers and fries.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jamie we re happy you enjoyed us again. Don t wait 25 years to visit us again.

reviews.review_text: Honestly some of the best burgers I ve ever had. Would definitely recommend. And also great service!
This place is incredible! Not a huge shop, but what they do, they do very well! Go ahead, have an ice cream float and relive a moment of childhood.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Twisted we appreciate the kind words.

reviews.review_text: I had a breakfast sandwich and it was delicious. The portion size is like snack size so you do need to make it a combo if you want a meal.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the support we appreciate it.

reviews.review_text: Love this yummy place.  So happy its back. So many milkshake flavors its a must try.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Raylene thanks for the shout out. We really appreciate your support

reviews.review_text: Dont trust yelp ratings. This place is amazing! Good prices and good food. And they have a great milkshake selection. Awesome place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you

reviews.review_text: Just like I remembered as a kid. I had the beefy boy burger, and it brought back a lot of memories. Same wax paper wrappers and bags for the fries. Really enjoyed it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Albert, hope we see you again soon

reviews.review_text: Great burgers. And even better home fries! Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you June we appreciate your support

reviews.review_text: Probably one of the best burgers Ive ever had. This place is a Vancouver legend reborn. Pop in for a deluxe chuckwagon burger , extra napkins and youll be in burger heaven.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words Alex. Glad you enjoyed your deluxe chuckwagon. We appreciate your business. Merry Christmas.

reviews.review_text: There are three givens in my life  One is that I will breath, second is that I will drink water at least once a day, and the third is that I will stop at Wallys every time I drive by. Staff is great, and the food is even better.
Great tasting burgers! Made on the spot quickly. Nice hidden spot and staff are friendly. Great value for price!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Ze thanks for the kind words. glad you enjoyed.

reviews.review_text: Soft bun and juicy patties. Their fries are loaded, can be shareable amongst two people. Friendly service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thanks for the kind words we appreciate your business

reviews.review_text: We had poutine and it was amazing! Simple but very tasty and so cheap. Definitely go there again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks

reviews.review_text: Beat item there is the poutine the burger is really good however I would like the poutines cheese to melt instead of having blocks on top only some of the cheese melts when I would prefer all of it melted
Pretty good burger. Pretty good poutine. Prices about average. Ill go back for sure :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Erick. We appreciate your feedback and support.

reviews.review_text: Their fries and milkshakes are so good. Would eat their burgers over the corporate/franchise giants any day!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nadine: thank you for the kind words we appreciate your support.

reviews.review_text: A fan since 1966, deluxe chuckwagon is my favourite burger  all time,hands down. Miss the original location on Kingsway.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks

reviews.review_text: The only place in this town who knows  exactly what a Hamburger should be. Not even most butchers in Vancouver can even offer  the proper blend - even if I ask.
Classic burgers, awesome buns, great price! Nice little place thats a bit hidden away.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Travis, glad you enjoyed it

reviews.review_text: always loved a Wally burger haven,t  been there for years  when you were on Kingsway  been about 15 years ago brought some of my family there good food  what more can I say it was delicious hard to find a place like yours keep it up                                yours forever David Kelly
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks. Glad you enjoyed it.

reviews.review_text: Dee..ee..ee...lish! I had a blueberry banana shake, a works burger and fries. Cant even say anything was just ok. It was fantabulous.
Best Burger i Have love there Onion Rings crispy and soooo sooo good.
Not quite the same as the old days with the parking lot full of hot rods but the food was good .
Best burger I ve ever had!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Brendan its nice to get positive feedback. We appreciate your kind words

reviews.review_text: Great burger and shakes. Tried out for the first time and loved it. Will visit again. Must try.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks glad you enjoyed your visit

reviews.review_text: Best burgers in Vancouver. They make them the way that made the old Wallys on Kingsway famous. Unbelievable shakes
Best burger Ive had in a long time. Friendly service as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thanks for the kind words Wes we really appreciate it

reviews.review_text: Absolute best burger Ive ever had. Friendly staff and good classic atmosphere
Great tasting burgers and nice staff. Definitely get the classic burger shack vibe from this place.
Tasty burgers. So many flavours of milkshakes. And we were able to get a vegan Beyond Burger this time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you we appreciate your support
